0: The facility and staff were pleasant
The hotel is clean and beautiful however the elevators broke and we had to go 33 floors with our luggage by foot on the stairs
I love the glass door shower and complimentary Sweet Grass toiletries

Loved the gym and the pool
I think they did an amazing job on the design and great amenities
Awesome being met in Atlantic City by Bruce on the big screens by escalator
Love my room lost my planner and house keeping for it down stair I was able to get it back
Good selection of restaurants and amenities but it is a huge building and you have to walk a long way from the parking garage to check in and a long way to the room
the room the casino the hallways loaded with music memorabilia the restaurant and bar
1: We were on the 33rd floor and had to wait 30 minutes or more for an elevator
The elevator service could have been better
I like the use of the gym even though it was not very big and you had to pay extra for it had some issue with my toilet it was not working properly
Check out a half an hour to get into an elevator to leave the property
The elevators were a bit of a problem in that the button for our floor 18 did not work in two of them
Dirty room service table in hallway for two days
Only drawback was loud band in lobby bar
WE STAYED IN A NON SMOKING PART OF THE HOTEL BUT WE STILL SMELLED SMOKE COMING FROM THE HALLWAYS AND NEAR THE WINDOWS
